edge: Raghu aka 'Guruji' is the guru and leader of Brahmānsh.
Shiva is the son of Amrita and Dev, and a newly recruited member of Brahmānsh who possesses the Agniastra.
baby Shiva is the younger version of Shiva.
Isha Chatterjee is an NRI from London and Shiva's girlfriend.
Junoon is Dev's right-hand woman who wields the Kavachāstra and aims to revive the Brahmāstra and release Dev.
Anish Shetty is an artist, architect, archaeologist, and a member of the Brahmānsh who wielded the Nandi Āstra.
Savitri Devi is a member of Brahmānsh.
Sher is a new recruit of Brahmānsh who wields the Nāg Dhanush.
Tensing is a new recruit of Brahmānsh who wielded the Pawanāstra.
Raveena is a new recruit of Brahmānsh who wields the Gajāstra.
Rani is a new recruit of Brahmānsh who possesses Āyu Madrikā.
Santha is a new recruit of Brahmānsh and its tech guy who wields the Chakravathāstra (Dagger of Resurrection).
Zor is a henchman of Junoon who stole the Nandi Āstra from Anish.
Raftaar is another henchman of Junoon who stole the Vanarāstra from Mohan.
Both Chaitanya Sharma and Saqib Ayub are portrayed as friends of Shiva.
Both Rashi Mal and Rohan Rustomji are depicted as cousins of Isha.
Farida Devi is presented as the landlady of Shiva.
Riyaaz Makaney plays the character of Isha's grandfather.
Shah Rukh Khan appears in a special appearance as Mohan Bhargav, a renowned scientist and member of the Brahmānsh.
